Package state

Interface ISponsorshipState

All Known Implementing Classes:
SponsorshipState
public interface ISponsorshipState
ISponsorshipState is an interface representing the portion of the application that contains all the SponsorshipRequest information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SponsorshipRequest addSponsorshipRequest​(TicketedEvent event)
    Create a new SponsorshipRequest (includes generating a new unique request number) and add it to a TicketedEvent and the sponsorship state
    SponsorshipRequest findRequestByNumber​(long requestNumber)  
    List<SponsorshipRequest> getAllSponsorshipRequests()  
    List<SponsorshipRequest> getPendingSponsorshipRequests()  

  • Method Details

    • addSponsorshipRequest

      SponsorshipRequest addSponsorshipRequest​(TicketedEvent event)
      Create a new SponsorshipRequest (includes generating a new unique request number) and add it to a TicketedEvent and the sponsorship state
      Parameters:
      event - event that the sponsorship request is for
      Returns:
      The newly created SponsorshipRequest

    • getAllSponsorshipRequests

      List<SponsorshipRequest> getAllSponsorshipRequests()
      Returns:
      List of all registered SponsorshipRequests

    • getPendingSponsorshipRequests

      List<SponsorshipRequest> getPendingSponsorshipRequests()
      Returns:
      List of those SponsorshipRequests that have SponsorshipStatus.PENDING

    • findRequestByNumber

      SponsorshipRequest findRequestByNumber​(long requestNumber)
      Parameters:
      requestNumber - unique request identifier to look up in the sponsorship state
      Returns:
      SponsorshipRequest corresponding to the specified request number if there is one, or null otherwise
